title: I love boards
body:
You love boards, we all love boards. Come join me in my happy slip into 遅い死S L O W ≈ D E A T H and listen to some V A P O R W A V E 蒸気の波の作成者.

Help me friends, help.

http://i.imgur.com/22VkAkF.jpg

replies.body:
this is beautiful

do you like nok from the future?
Easier to use if the colours were better.
I don't know what's going on here but I like it.
